alert.note: Alert for Luce; Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 4:47PM EDT until August 25 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Luce County in eastern Upper Michigan... Northeastern Schoolcraft County in east central Upper Michigan... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 447 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near M-28 between Shingleton and Seney, or 19 miles southeast of Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McMillan, Germfask, Seney, Manistique Lake, M-28 between Shingleton and Seney, and Helmer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
